parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball joints can cause the wheel to come loose or fall off, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle's wheel falls off or comes loose while driving
the vehicle's wheel drops suddenly
the ball joint breaks or fails
the tapered part of the ball joint is not properly secured
the spindle has an egg-shaped and hollow appearance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The reduced visibility of the instrument panel can cause the driver to lose sight of important information, such as speed, fuel level, and warning lights, which can lead to accidents or unsafe driving conditions.
symptoms: The instrument panel is difficult to see during the day
the brightness of the instrument panel decreases over time
the driver is unable to see the vehicle's speed
the dashboard reflects into the windshield
causing distortions of view.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle catching fire without warning can cause significant damage, injury, or even loss of life.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly catches fire while parked
with no apparent reason or warning signs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The difficulty in shifting gears can cause accidents, especially when the vehicle is unable to move or respond quickly to changing traffic conditions.
symptoms: The column shift lever is hard to move from park to drive or reverse
requiring excessive force or effort.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake master cylinder can cause complete brake failure, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden loss of brake function
inability to stop the vehicle
extended stopping distance
throttle stuck in wide-open position
accidental acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake system failure can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities due to extended stopping distance and unintended acceleration.
symptoms: Extended stopping distance when applying the brakes
throttle stuck in wide-open position
accidental acceleration.
